Elements.Body: Hey, thanks for taking the time to get through all of my questions. To be honest, I didn’t realize you would be so patient. With me ditching your prom on a week’s notice, and then that thing about Megan, I half-expected you not to show out of spite. Or I don’t know, I know you’re not that kind of person. I just didn’t know if we were alright.
Whether we’re alright is up to you, I think.
We’re definitely cool! Haha, what made you believe otherwise?

Well, tomorrow’s prom, isn’t it? Kat actually told me the plan already, haha. All of you are going to stay over at a friend’s place in Forest Hills, right? Sounds like plenty fun! You’re going to have to send me pictures, though. I want to see what we could have been lol

Well, tomorrow’s prom, isn’t it? Kat actually told me the plan already, haha. All of you are going to stay over at a friend’s place in Forest Hills, right? Sounds like plenty fun! You’re going to have to send me pictures, though. I want to see what we could have been lol
Haha, this is weird, you don’t need to make me feel better. I’ve got this.
Still got the pocket square to match your green dress, too.

Well, you’ve earned yourself a bit of a break anyway. I’m having difficulty coming to terms with all this Nightmare stuff - I can’t imagine what it’s like for you, having been there from the start. Let someone else take the wheel for a bit. I’ve been looking into some people we can talk to about Nightmares - people like you and Lawrence who have also had those weird dreams you described - and I think they could give us the help we need.

I appreciate the thought, but I don’t think I can turn away from this that easily. It’s going to take too long to get all of these new people up to speed anyway.
Thanks, Lydia. We’re dealing with this as a team, don’t forget that.
